problem_names:
lemma omega_cases: "(x, z) \<in> omega R \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<And>y. (x, y) \<in> R \<Longrightarrow> (y, z) \<in> omega R \<Longrightarrow> P) \<Longrightarrow> P"

lemma omega_coinduct: "X x z \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<And>x z. X x z \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y. (x, y) \<in> R \<and> (X y z \<or> (y, z) \<in> omega R)) \<Longrightarrow>
  (x, z) \<in> omega R"

lemma omega_weak_coinduct: "X x z \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<And>x z. X x z \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y. (x, y) \<in> R \<and> X y z) \<Longrightarrow>
  (x, z) \<in> omega R"
translations:
lemma omega_cases: "(x, z) \<in> omega R \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<And>y. (x, y) \<in> R \<Longrightarrow> (y, z) \<in> omega R \<Longrightarrow> P) \<Longrightarrow> P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>(x, z) \<in> Omega_Algebra_Models.omega R;
     \<And>y.
        \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> R;
         (y, z) \<in> Omega_Algebra_Models.omega R\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> P\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> P
by (metis omega.cases)

lemma omega_coinduct: "X x z \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<And>x z. X x z \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y. (x, y) \<in> R \<and> (X y z \<or> (y, z) \<in> omega R)) \<Longrightarrow>
  (x, z) \<in> omega R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>X x z;
     \<And>x z.
        X x z \<Longrightarrow>
        \<exists>y.
           (x, y) \<in> R \<and>
           (X y z \<or> (y, z) \<in> Omega_Algebra_Models.omega R)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> Omega_Algebra_Models.omega R
by (metis (full_types) omega.coinduct)

lemma omega_weak_coinduct: "X x z \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<And>x z. X x z \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y. (x, y) \<in> R \<and> X y z) \<Longrightarrow>
  (x, z) \<in> omega R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>X x z;
     \<And>x z.
        X x z \<Longrightarrow>
        \<exists>y. (x, y) \<in> R \<and> X y z\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> Omega_Algebra_Models.omega R
by (metis omega.coinduct)
interpretation rel_omega_algebra: omega_algebra "(\<union>)" "(O)" Id "{}" "(\<subseteq>)" "(\<subset>)" rtrancl omega

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. class.omega_algebra (\<union>) (O) Id {} (\<subseteq>) (\<subset>)
     rtrancl Omega_Algebra_Models.omega
proof

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       Omega_Algebra_Models.omega x
       \<subseteq> x O Omega_Algebra_Models.omega x
 2. \<And>y z x.
       y \<subseteq> z \<union> x O y \<Longrightarrow>
       y \<subseteq> Omega_Algebra_Models.omega x \<union> x\<^sup>* O z
fix x :: "'a rel"

       y \<subseteq> Omega_Algebra_Models.omega x \<union> x\<^sup>* O z
show "omega x \<subseteq> x O omega x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Omega_Algebra_Models.omega x
    \<subseteq> x O Omega_Algebra_Models.omega x
by (auto elim: omega_cases)

proof (rule omega_weak_coinduct[where X="\<lambda>a b. (a,b) \<in> x O y \<and> (a,b) \<notin> x\<^sup>* O z"])

       (xa, za) \<in> x O y \<and>
       (xa, za) \<notin> x\<^sup>* O z \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>ya.
          (xa, ya) \<in> x \<and>
          (ya, za) \<in> x O y \<and> (ya, za) \<notin> x\<^sup>* O z
